title: Minor scratch during playtime
description: Charlie received a minor scratch on his ear during group play. Cleaned and monitored. No vet visit required.
immediateActions: Cleaned wound, applied antiseptic, monitored for 24 hours

title: Upset stomach
description: Luna vomited once in the morning. Withheld food for 4 hours, then offered bland diet.
resolutionNotes: Resumed normal eating by evening, no further issues

title: Anxiety during thunderstorm
description: Bella showed signs of anxiety during evening thunderstorm. Provided comfort and moved to quieter area.
immediateActions: Moved to interior room, provided calming music, stayed with her
resolutionNotes: Calmed down after storm passed. Owner notified and appreciated the care.

title: Limping after play
description: Duke was limping slightly after outdoor play. Examined and rested. No swelling or pain on touch.
medicalTreatment: Vet phone consult - advised rest and monitoring
resolutionNotes: No limp after 24 hours of rest. Resumed normal activity.

title: Loose stool
description: Buddy had loose stool this morning. May be due to treat given by owner at drop-off.
immediateActions: Monitoring, bland diet offered, owner notified

title: Excessive barking
description: Cooper barked excessively during first hour. Normal adjustment period for new environment.
resolutionNotes: Settled down after 2 hours. No issues since.

title: Food refusal
description: Tucker refused breakfast. Tried different food placement and hand-feeding.
immediateActions: Tried hand feeding, offered treats, monitored
resolutionNotes: Ate dinner normally. May have been anxious first morning.

title: Hiding behavior
description: Whiskers hiding in carrier most of first day. Normal cat adjustment behavior.
immediateActions: Quiet environment, Feliway diffuser, minimal handling
